trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Administra una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> class is designed to be a container of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> objects.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> clase está diseñada para ser un contenedor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> objetos.

trans-unit.source: It provides common services that handle event routing between designers, property windows, and other global objects.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona servicios comunes identificador evento enrutamiento entre diseñadores, ventanas de propiedades y otros objetos globales.

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> is optional, but it is recommended if you intend to have several designer windows.
trans-unit.target: Usar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> es opcional, pero se recomienda si piensa tener varias ventanas del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> class provides several design-time services automatically.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> clase proporciona varios servicios en tiempo de diseño automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: You can override each of these services by replacing them in the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Puede reemplazar cada uno de estos servicios al reemplazarlos en protegido <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para reemplazar un servicio, reemplace el constructor, llame a la base y realice los cambios a través de la protegido <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: All services added to the service container that implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface are disposed when the design surface manager is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Todos los servicios agregados al contenedor de servicios que implementan el <xref:System.IDisposable> interfaz se eliminan cuando se elimina el Administrador de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface as the default service.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> clase proporciona el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interfaz como el servicio predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> provides a global eventing mechanism for designer events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> Proporciona un mecanismo de generación global de eventos para eventos del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: With this mechanism, an application is informed when a designer becomes active.
trans-unit.target: Con este mecanismo, se informa a una aplicación cuando se activa un diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The service provides a collection of designers and a single place where global objects, such as the Properties window, can monitor selection change events.
trans-unit.target: El servicio proporciona una colección de diseñadores y un único lugar donde los objetos globales, como la ventana Propiedades, pueden supervisar la selección de eventos de cambio.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener acceso completo a los recursos del sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valores de petición: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estado asociado:

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: Proveedor de servicios primario.

trans-unit.source: Service requests are forwarded to this provider if they cannot be resolved by the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Las solicitudes de servicio se reenvían a este proveedor si el administrador de la superficie de diseño no las puede resolver.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the active designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el diseñador activo.

trans-unit.source: The active designer.
trans-unit.target: Diseñador activo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ActiveDesignSurface%2A> property should be set by the designer's user interface whenever a designer becomes the active window.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ActiveDesignSurface%2A> propiedad se debe establecer mediante la interfaz de usuario del diseñador cada vez que un diseñador se convierte en la ventana activa.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property works with the default implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface to notify interested parties that a new designer is now active.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada de esta propiedad funciona con la implementación predeterminada de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interfaz para notificar a las partes interesadas que un nuevo diseñador ahora está activo.

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, you should override this property to notify your service appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Si proporciona su propia implementación de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, debe invalidar esta propiedad para notificar a su servicio en la forma adecuada.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`, indicating that no designer is active.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad puede establecerse en `null`, que indica que ningún diseñador está activo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the currently active designer changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el actual diseñador activo.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia de una superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia de una superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: Nueva instancia de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: Proveedor de servicios primario.

trans-unit.source: A new merged service provider will be created that will first ask this provider for a service, and then delegate any failures to the design surface manager object.
trans-unit.target: Se creará un nuevo proveedor de servicios combinado que primero solicitará un servicio a este proveedor y, a continuación, delegará cualquier error en el objeto administrador de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: This merged provider will be passed into the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore(System.IServiceProvider)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Este proveedor combinado se pasará al método <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore(System.IServiceProvider)" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia de una superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: Nueva instancia de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: If you want to conveniently add additional per-designer services, use the `parentProvider` parameter to provide a service provider for this design surface.
trans-unit.target: Si desea agregar cómodamente servicios adicionales de por el diseñador, utilice el `parentProvider` parámetro para proporcionar un proveedor de servicios para esta superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> method creates a merged service provider that can satisfy service requests from both the given service provider as well as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> itself.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> método crea un proveedor de servicios combinado que puede satisfacer las solicitudes de servicio del proveedor de servicio determinado, así como la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> propio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> method then passes this service provider into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> método, a continuación, pasa este proveedor de servicios en la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> returns the design surface, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> method tries to obtain the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>.
trans-unit.target: Después de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> devuelve la superficie de diseño, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> método intenta obtener la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>.

trans-unit.source: If it is present, and if it is the instance of the service that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> provided by default, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: Si está presente, y si es la instancia del servicio que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> proporciona de forma predeterminada, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> método genera el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated> eventos.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentProvider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentProvider" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If an external implementation of the service was provided, it is the responsibility of the class that derives from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class to raise the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Si se proporciona una implementación externa del servicio, es responsabilidad de la clase que deriva de la <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> clase para generar el <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated" /> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A service provider to pass to the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Proveedor de servicios que se va a pasar a la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: This is either an instance of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> or an object that implements <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />, and represents a merge between the service provider of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class and an externally passed provider.
trans-unit.target: Bien es una instancia de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />, o bien un objeto que implementa <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> y representa una combinación del proveedor de servicios de la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> y de un proveedor que se ha pasado externamente.

trans-unit.source: Implementation that creates the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Implementación que crea la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: Nueva instancia de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> method is called by both <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> método llaman <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: It is the implementation that actually creates the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Es la implementación que realmente crea la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation just returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada simplemente devuelve un nuevo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.

trans-unit.source: You may override this method to provide a custom object that derives from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> class.
trans-unit.target: Puede invalidar este método para proporcionar un objeto personalizado que se deriva de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> clase.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a designer is created.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se crea un diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a designer is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se desecha un diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of design surfaces.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una colección de superficies de diseño.

trans-unit.source: A collection of design surfaces that are currently hosted by the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Colección de superficies de diseño actualmente hospedada por el administrador de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.DesignSurfaces%2A> property is implemented directly on top of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, so if you provide your own implementation of that service, this property uses your implementation.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.DesignSurfaces%2A> propiedad se implementa directamente en la parte superior de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, por lo que si proporciona su propia implementación de dicho servicio, esta propiedad usa la implementación.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos que usa <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos que usa <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> method follows the standard <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: Público <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> método sigue el estándar <xref:System.IDisposable> patrón.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method destroys the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Llamar a este método destruye el Administrador de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement <xref:System.IDisposable> to also be disposed.
trans-unit.target: También elimina el contenedor de servicio, que hace que todos los servicios que implementan <xref:System.IDisposable> también van a eliminar.

trans-unit.source: The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: La versión protegida de este método es `virtual` y sigue la normal <xref:System.IDisposable> patrón.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Dado que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> no tiene ningún código nativo para limpiar, no tiene un finalizador que llama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you need to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, you must add a finalizer yourself.
trans-unit.target: Si necesita llamar a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, debe agregar un finalizador.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es <see langword="false" /> para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no administrados que usa <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> method follows the standard <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: Público <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> método sigue el estándar <xref:System.IDisposable> patrón.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method destroys the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Llamar a este método destruye el Administrador de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement <xref:System.IDisposable> to also be disposed.
trans-unit.target: También elimina el contenedor de servicio, que hace que todos los servicios que implementan <xref:System.IDisposable> también van a eliminar.

trans-unit.source: The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: La versión protegida de este método es `virtual` y sigue la normal <xref:System.IDisposable> patrón.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Dado que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> no tiene ningún código nativo para limpiar, no tiene un finalizador que llama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you need to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, you must add a finalizer yourself.
trans-unit.target: Si necesita llamar a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, debe agregar un finalizador.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a este método público `Dispose()` método y <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` se invoca el protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método con el `disposing` parámetro establecido en `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` con `disposing` establecido en `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> references.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el `disposing` del parámetro es true, este método libera todos los recursos retenidos por los objetos administrados que este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> referencias.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca al método `Dispose()` de cada uno de los objetos a los que se hace referencia.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> puede recibir varias llamadas de otros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> tenga cuidado de no hacer referencia a objetos que se hayan eliminado en una llamada anterior a <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre cómo implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de <see langword="Dispose" /> y <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [reemplazar el método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: The service type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de servicio que se va a recuperar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a service in the design surface manager’s service container.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un servicio del contenedor de servicios del administrador de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements, or is a derived class of, the given service type; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if the service does not exist in the service container.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa, o es una clase derivada, el tipo de servicio especificado; de lo contrario, si el servicio no existe en el contenedor de servicios, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.GetService%2A> method forwards to any service provider that was given to the design surface manager at construction time.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.GetService%2A> método reenvía a cualquier proveedor de servicio que se utilizó para el Administrador de la superficie de diseño en tiempo de construcción.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the global selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia la selección global.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the active designer's selection of component set changes.
trans-unit.target: Este evento se desencadena cuando la selección del diseñador activo del componente de conjunto de cambios.

trans-unit.source: This is mapped through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface.
trans-unit.target: Se asigna a través de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: Gets the design surface manager's <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la propiedad <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer" /> del administrador de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The design surface manager's <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer" /> del administrador de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Classes inheriting from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class can use this property to add and remove services.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que heredan de la <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> clase puede utilizar esta propiedad para agregar y quitar servicios.
